item.title: Jim Cramer Warns Of Potential ‘Cracks’ In AI Data Center Market
item.description: Cramer suggested that although investment demand is high, investors feel OpenAI is spending beyond its means.

item.title: Movano Shares Swing After Announcing Merger With AI Cloud Firm Corvex
item.description: Under the merger terms, the transaction values Movano shares at $6.25 each.

item.title: TreeHouse Foods To Go Private In $2.9 Billion Sale To Investindustrial
item.description: The company reported third-quarter revenue of $840.3 million with a loss per share of $5.26.

item.title: Dow Futures Rise As Senate Votes To End Government Shutdown: MTSR, VSAT, RUM, TSM Among Stocks To Watch
item.description: While Dow Jones futures were up by 0.45% at the time of writing, the S&P 500 futures rose 0.99%.
